opencard.opt.signature

Interface JCAStandardNames


  • public interface JCAStandardNames
    Java cryptography standard algorithm names as used by the signature card services.
    For an exact definition of the algorithms see http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.2/docs/guide/security/CryptoSpec.html.
    Version:
    $Id: JCAStandardNames.java,v 1.1.1.1 1999/10/05 15:08:48 damke Exp $
    Author:
    Peter Bendel (peter_bendel@de.ibm.com)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DES_CIPHER
      DES ciphering
      static java.lang.String ISO_PADDING
      ISO 9796
      static java.lang.String MD5
      MD5 hash
      static java.lang.String PKCS_PADDING
      PKCS # 1 padding
      static java.lang.String PKCS8_PADDING
      PKCS # 8 padding
      static java.lang.String RAW_DSA
      DSA assymetric PKA algorithm (without hashing)
      static java.lang.String RAW_RSA
      RSA pka algorithm (without hashing)
      static java.lang.String SHA1
      SHA-1 hash
      static java.lang.String SHA1_DSA
      DSA pka algorithm including SHA-1 hashing
      static java.lang.String SHA1_RSA
      SHA-1 hash and RSA pka algorithm
      static java.lang.String ZERO_PADDING
      zero padding
